attributes.action: Speaker of the House of Commons failed his role and failed neutrality.
attributes.additional_details:
Watch the news it's not rocket science. 

He has over stepped the mark.
attributes.background: He has shown his politics and spoken against the leader of the free world to speak in the Commons. He has become biest against American democracy.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

If you like, you could sign the petition below, which asks the House of Commons to debate a vote of no confidence in the Speaker:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183279
